item.title: How to Position Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Rotate an Object: With Mouse With Keyboard How to Bring an Object Forward: With Click With Keyboard How to Send an Object Backward: With Click With Keyboard How to Lock an Object How to Unlock an Object: With Click With Right Click With Keyboard No time to scroll down? Click through these tutorial slides: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Rotate an Object With Mouse Step 1: First select an object.
